vulnerabilities: Information Exposure Through an Error Message
description: The function is vulnerable to several types of attacks. It uses user-provided input to construct file paths (CWE-22, Path Traversal) and shell commands (CWE-78, OS Command Injection). It also uses user-provided input to construct JavaScript code (CWE-94, Code Injection). The function may expose sensitive information through error messages (CWE-209) and through environment variables (CWE-200).
